Description: Saudi Kayan Petrochemical (known as: Saudi Kayan) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since June 2007. Saudi Kayan operates within the Materials sector focusing on Commodity Chemicals. It has Company operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Specialty Chemicals. Saudi Kayan is based in Jubail, Saudi Arabia and was established in June 2007.
